servinfo.title: Electric Throttle Body Assembly Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Throttle Body and Intake Manifold Components:For J20 Engine

s1.ptxt: Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining:For Petrol Engine Model .
Disconnect breather hose (1) from air cleaner outlet hose (2).
Disconnect air cleaner outlet hose (2) from air cleaner case and electric throttle body assembly.
Disconnect engine coolant hoses (1) from electric throttle body assembly (2).
Disconnect connector (3) from electric throttle body assembly.
Remove electric throttle body assembly from intake manifold.
Clean mating surfaces, and install new throttle body gasket to intake manifold.
Install electric throttle body assembly (1) to intake manifold.
Connect connector (2) to electric throttle body assembly securely.
Connect engine coolant hoses (3) to electric throttle body assembly (1).
Connect air cleaner outlet hose (1) to air cleaner case and electric throttle body assembly.
Connect breather hose (2) to air cleaner outlet hose (1).
Refill coolant referring to Cooling System Flush and Refill:For Petrol Engine Model .
Perform calibration of electric throttle body assembly referring to Electric Throttle Body System Calibration:For Petrol Engine Model if replaced.
